price: 52. Koros nadaamitak, nee gee finqaaw! ni-magooqak (kubuuruk) nee teyyeeqem miyyaay itte? Keenil gacisak ah Yalli sinam edde xagniseemiy, farmoytit nummâ xaagu как tecee kinni keenik iyyan.
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرۡقَدِنَاۜۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāwaylanā man baʿathanā min marqadinā hādhā mā waʿada al-raḥmānu waṣadaqa al-mur'salūna
